dcterms:creator: M. Cooke
J. Barker
S. Cunningham
X. Shao
dcterms:description: The dataset consists of 3 seconds long audio and video recordings of 34 speakers pronouncing 1000 sentences in front of a frame-based camera and microphone. The camera records data at 25 frames per second, while the microphone data is recorded at 50kHz.
dcterms:title: GRID dataset

dcterms:creator: C. Posh
D. Matolin
R. Wohlgenannt
dcterms:description: A QVGA 143 dB dynamic range frame-free PWM image sensor with lossless pixel-level video compression and time-domain CDS.
dcterms:title: ATIS event-driven camera
